00014 // Sample status flags
00015 #define           SAMPLE_ALLOCATED        0x00000001
00016 #define           SAMPLE_LOCKED                 0x00000002
00017 #define           SAMPLE_RANDOM                 0x00000004
00018 #define           SAMPLE_RANDOM_MANUAL    0x00000008
00019 
00020 // Sound error values (they're all the same)
00021 #define           NO_SAMPLE                     0xffffffff
00022 #define           SOUND_ERROR                   0xffffffff
00023 
00024 // Maximum allowable priority value
00025 #define           PRIORITY_MAX                  0xfffffffe
00026 #define           PRIORITY_RANDOM               PRIORITY_MAX-1
00027

00029 // Structure definition for sound parameters being passed down to the sample playing function
00030 typedef struct {
00031                         UINT32                  uiSpeed;
00032                         UINT32                  uiPitchBend;                              // Random pitch bend range +/-
00033                         UINT32                  uiVolume;
00034                         UINT32                  uiPan;
00035                         UINT32                  uiLoop;
00036                         UINT32                  uiPriority;
00037                         void              (*EOSCallback)(void *);
00038                         void              *pCallbackData;
00039                         } SOUNDPARMS;
00040 
00041 
00042 // Structure definition for parameters to the random sample playing function
00043 typedef struct {
00044                         UINT32                  uiTimeMin, uiTimeMax;
00045                         UINT32                  uiSpeedMin, uiSpeedMax;
00046                         UINT32                  uiVolMin, uiVolMax;
00047                         UINT32                  uiPanMin, uiPanMax;
00048                         UINT32                  uiPriority;
00049                         UINT32                  uiMaxInstances;
00050                         } RANDOMPARMS;
